STATE
v.
McPHAIL. No. COA06-1177. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed July 3, 2007. Certification Date July 23, 2007. Appeal from the Robeson (04CRS50631, 04CRS51228, 04CRS51229, 04CRS51230, 04CRS51231, 04CRS51232, 04CRS51233, 04CRS51234, 04CRS51235, 04CRS51236, 04CRS51237, 04CRS51238, 04CRS51239, 04CRS51240, 04CRS51241, 04CRS51242, 04CRS51243, 04CRS51244, 04CRS51245, 04CRS51246, 04CRS51247, 04CRS51248).

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part; reversed in part.
